problem_text: A point $P$ needs to be located somewhere on the line $A D$ so that the total length $L$ of cables linking $P$ to the points $A, B$, and $C$ is minimized (see the figure). By expressing $L$ as a function of $x=|A P|$ and using the graphs of $L$ and $d L / d x$, estimate the minimum value of $L$.
